description:
The Magic User`s Club is a group of high schoolers who can do actual, honest-to-goodness magic! Their leader, Takeo, wants to fight against the aliens who are invading earth, but it`ll be a tough task for this group of misfits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Bell, Takakura, and Flying Magic
Tsurigane to, Takakura-senpai to, Soratobu Mahou
ツリガネと, 高倉先輩と, 空飛ぶ魔法
